name: Astroflux (itch)
description:
Astroflux - a retro styled, action packed MMO space shooter.

Start your journey and explore the huge Astroflux Universe. Team up with other players and take down the aggressive bosses and hordes of enemies while you search for new materials and scraps to upgrade your ship.

Astroflux sports cozy arcade graphics paired with modern awesome particle effects. And, the soundtrack is great!

Enjoy and fly safe!
